text: @WhiteHouse 52,296 Americans are dead as of 10:24 pm EST April 24 because YOU eliminated the pandemic protections President @BarackObama had in place and because YOU refused to take the coronavirus seriously! YOU even urged your followers to violate state health laws! You are scum! RESIGN!
